pageTitle: Pencey Standard Swing Button Tank | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 22in / 56cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Imported, China. Hand wash or dry clean. 100% modal. Fabric: Soft jersey. Colorful blossoms punctuate this soft jersey swing tank from Pencey Standard, which falls to an uneven hem for a fun, feminine fit. Pearlized buttons fasten the front, and the skinny double shoulder straps meet at a racer back. Semi-sheer. Description Sale > Pencey Standard > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer The ultimate collection of classic tees, up-to-date tanks, and lightweight fleece, Pencey Standard fulfills every girl's obsession for the perfect go-to piece. Launched in spring 2011 by Pencey designer Christina Minasian, Pencey Standard is a line of necessities rather than basics. With cropped, fitted, and oversized silhouettes in a color palette of white, grey, and black, Pencey Standard is meant to be mixed and matched with its sister line, Pencey.
